ValidationRule.description: Applies to fields where future dates should not be allowed/entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( Account_Application_Sent_to_Custodian__c >TODAY(), Agreement_Received__c >TODAY(), Assets_Received__c >TODAY(), Census_and_Eligibility_Uploaded__c >TODAY(), Conversion_Assets_Posted__c >TODAY(), Conversion_Records_Received__c >TODAY(), Custodial_Account_Number_Received__c >TODAY(), Final_Reporting_Received__c >TODAY(), Implementation_Completion_Date__c >TODAY(), OPD_PRR_Completed__c >TODAY(), OPD_PRR_Requested__c >TODAY(), Plan_Sponsor_Tour_Completed__c >TODAY(), Plan_Sponsor_Tour_Requested__c >TODAY(), Post_OPD_PRR_Docs_Sent__c >TODAY(), Schwab_Fee_Disclosure_Initiated__c >TODAY(), Ubiquity_Plan_Documents_Signed__c >TODAY(), Prior_Plan_Documents_Received__c >TODAY())
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Future dates aren't allowed in one or more of the date fields coded in Orange below
